org.apache.ambari.server.utils

Class ShellCommandUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.utils.ShellCommandUtil

  • public class ShellCommandUtil
extends Object
    Logs OpenSsl command exit code with description

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ShellCommandUtil.InteractiveHandler
      InteractiveHandler is a handler for interactive sessions with command line commands.
      static class  ShellCommandUtil.Result 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean LINUX
      Set to true when run on Linux platforms
      static boolean MAC
      Set to true when run on Mac OS platforms
      static String MASK_EVERYBODY_RWX
      Permission mask 777 allows everybody to read/modify/execute file
      static String MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RW
      Permission mask 600 allows only owner to read and modify file.
      static String MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RWX
      Permission mask 700 allows only owner to read, modify and execute file.
      static boolean UNIX_LIKE
      Set to true when run if platform is detected to be UNIX compatible
      static boolean WINDOWS
      Set to true when run on Windows platforms

        Set to true when run on Windows platforms

      • LINUX

        Set to true when run on Linux platforms

      • MAC

        public static final boolean MAC
        Set to true when run on Mac OS platforms

      • UNIX_LIKE

        public static final boolean UNIX_LIKE
        Set to true when run if platform is detected to be UNIX compatible

      • MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RW

        public static final String MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RW
        Permission mask 600 allows only owner to read and modify file. Other users (except root) can't read/modify file
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RWX

        public static final String MASK_OWNER_ONLY_RWX
        Permission mask 700 allows only owner to read, modify and execute file. Other users (except root) can't read/modify/execute file
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MASK_EVERYBODY_RWX

        public static final String MASK_EVERYBODY_RWX
        Permission mask 777 allows everybody to read/modify/execute file
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getUnixFilePermissions

        public static String getUnixFilePermissions(String path)
        Gets file permissions on Linux systems. Under Windows/Mac, command always returns MASK_EVERYBODY_RWX
        Parameters:
        path -

      • setUnixFilePermissions

        public static void setUnixFilePermissions(String mode,
                                          String path)
        Sets file permissions to a given value on Linux systems. On Windows/Mac, command is silently ignored
        Parameters:
        mode -
        path -

      • setFileOwner

        public static ShellCommandUtil.Result setFileOwner(String path,
                                                   String ownerName)
        Sets the owner for a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        ownerName - the owner's local username
        Returns:
        the result of the operation

        Returns:
        the result of the operation

      • setFileMode

        public static ShellCommandUtil.Result setFileMode(String path,
                                                  boolean ownerReadable,
                                                  boolean ownerWritable,
                                                  boolean ownerExecutable,
                                                  boolean groupReadable,
                                                  boolean groupWritable,
                                                  boolean groupExecutable,
                                                  boolean otherReadable,
                                                  boolean otherWritable,
                                                  boolean otherExecutable)
        Set the access modes for a file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        ownerWritable - true if the owner should be able to write to this file; otherwise false
        ownerReadable - true if the owner should be able to read this file; otherwise false
        ownerExecutable - true if the owner should be able to execute this file; otherwise false
        groupWritable - true if the group should be able to write to this file; otherwise false
        groupReadable - true if the group should be able to read this file; otherwise false
        groupExecutable - true if the group should be able to execute this file; otherwise false
        otherReadable - true if other users should be able to read this file; otherwise false
        otherWritable - true if other users should be able to write to this file; otherwise false
        otherExecutable - true if other users should be able to execute this file; otherwise false
        Returns:
        the result of the operation

      • pathExists

        public static ShellCommandUtil.Result pathExists(String path,
                                                 boolean sudo)
                                          throws IOException,
                                                 InterruptedException
        Test if a file or directory exists
        Parameters:
        path - the path to test
        sudo - true to execute the command using sudo (ambari-sudo); otherwise false
        Returns:
        the shell command result, success indicates the file or directory exists
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • copyFile

        public static ShellCommandUtil.Result copyFile(String srcFile,
                                               String destFile,
                                               boolean force,
                                               boolean sudo)
                                        throws IOException,
                                               InterruptedException
        Copies a source file to the specified destination.
        Parameters:
        srcFile - the path to the source file
        destFile - the path to the destination file
        force - true to force copy even if the file exists
        sudo - true to execute the command using sudo (ambari-sudo); otherwise false
        Returns:
        the shell command result
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

                                             boolean force,
                                             boolean sudo)
                                      throws IOException,
                                             InterruptedException
        Deletes the file.
        Parameters:
        file - the path to the file to be deleted
        force - true to force copy even if the file exists
        sudo - true to execute the command using sudo (ambari-sudo); otherwise false
        Returns:

        Throws:

        InterruptedException

      • runCommand

        public static ShellCommandUtil.Result runCommand(String[] args,
                                                 Map<String,String> vars,
                                                 ShellCommandUtil.InteractiveHandler interactiveHandler,
                                                 boolean sudo)
                                          throws IOException,
                                                 InterruptedException
        Runs a command with a given set of environment variables
        Parameters:
        args - a String[] of the command and its arguments
        vars - a Map of String,String setting an environment variable to run the command with
        interactiveHandler - a handler to provide responses to queries from the command, or null if no queries are expected
        sudo - true to execute the command using sudo (ambari-sudo); otherwise false
        Returns:
        Result
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
